title: FIREWALL ISSUE PLEASE FOR THE LOVE OF GOD HELP
body: I tried playing CUSTOM , CUSTOM GAME , a FKING CUSTOM GAMe and i couldnt i get firewall error , and here's the kicker , MY FIREWALL IS DISABLED FOLLOWING THE STEPS I WAS GIVEN BY RITO , so i was like maybe coz custom is getting high , i went into normal and BAM i didnt get the error , after the first match i played another game and BAM , I GET THE FKING FIREWALL ERROR , XPLAIN , PLEASE EXPLAIN TO ME THIS SORCERY IM SO FKING PISSED

replies.body: Same problem here, sometime works, but in most cases i get firewall error. And all started after 5.5 patch.

Might be an inconsistent retrieval of data, ie. a bad connection.

What's your ping in game?
